name: Treasure Hunt (SalinasMarkGameDev)
description:
Treasure Hunt developed by Mark Salinas

Character sprite from Pixel Art Side Scroller Pack created by Martha Maksymiec

Platform art assets from 8-Bits Platform Kit 1 created by Niobium Studios

Treasure Hunt is a 2D platforming game where the player freely navigates each level in search of the treasures that are scattered around. The game takes place in ruined temple where the player plays a treasure hunter who seeks to gather hidden treasures within. The player will control the movements of the playable 2D treasure hunter to navigate the platforms and mechanics throughout each level. The core theme of the game correlates with the gameplay which involves the player to explore each level and discover the treasures and different paths to take to get to those treasures within each level.

Goal for each level is to find and collect all four treasures.

There are multiple paths the player can take to get to the treasures and the player is free to collect all treasures in any order he or she sees fit. From a chosen path, player will encounter ropes, ladders, wall jump sequences, and moveable objects that he or she must use to access areas and move forward through the level.

Player Controls:

1. Press left and right arrow keys or A and D keys to move 

2. Press space bar to jump and press it continuously against a wall to wall jump
